issue.title: [C++][Gandiva] Cache only object code in memory instead of entire module
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14048](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14048). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Implement Gandiva to cache object code instead the entire llvm module, improving the memory consumption and LLVM time perfomance.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14048?focusedCommentId=17452941) by Pindikura Ravindra (pravindra):*
Issue resolved by pull request 11193
